holidays.name: World Backup Day
holidays.description: A day to remind individuals and businesses to back up their important data to avoid digital disasters.
holidays.origin: Started in 2011 as a social movement to raise awareness about the importance of data backups.
holidays.funFact: Approximately 30% of people lose their data due to not backing up, making this day both practical and lifesaving!

holidays.name: Cesar Chavez Day

holidays.name: Bunsen Burner Day
holidays.description: A quirky tribute to the iconic lab tool that revolutionized chemistry experiments worldwide.
holidays.origin: Celebrated unofficially on March 31 because Robert Bunsen was born on this day in 1811.
holidays.funFact: The Bunsen burner was invented in 1855 and remains a staple in laboratories to this day!
